oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gen. John J. Pershing
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This autographed photograph of Gen. John J. Pershing was given to Gen. George H. Harries. The inscription reads"For Brig-gen Geo. H. Harries, With sincere good wishes." The photograph is from a scapbook of photographs and documents about Harries. Harries commanded the 186th Inf. Brig., 93rd Div. from December 1917-May 1918. He then commanded Base Section No. 5 (U.S. facilities in and around port of Brest, France) from May-November 1918. He commanded U.S. Mission in Berlin after the Armistice.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pershing, John J. (John Joseph), 1860-1948
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:instructionalMethod: US.28; John J. Pershing; World War I
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
